column4: I just updated my 12.04 and my firefox won't start.  Installed Chromium and it too would not start.  I have access to net (hence the update and installation of Chromium) but no web browser will start.  Any one else ever experience this?
before trying to launch from terminal us "ps U (username)" and ensure that you kill all pid for any firefox instances running
I tried what you suggested but nothing happens.  Typing firefox in the terminal window just gives me a prompt.
